    • findActivityAndActitem

      public ActivitySortpage findActivityAndActitem​(java.lang.Integer id)
      use id to find activity and actitems to make a activitySortpage
      参数:
      id - the activityId
      返回:
      ActivitySortpage that have the id
      抛出:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when id is null or the param of activitySortpage is null or the mongo data of actitem is null
      org.springframework.orm.jpa.JpaObjectRetrievalFailureException - when id is invalid or no activity is found
      org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException - when activity is not found
      ”date”
      2020.8.15

      public java.util.List<ActivitySortpage> selectSearchResult​(java.lang.String type, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String city) throws java.io.IOException, org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
      selectSearch result
      参数:
      type -
      name -
      city -
      返回:
      true if initialize finished successfully
      抛出:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when param is null or the param of activitySortpage is null or the mongo data of actitem is null
      org.springframework.orm.jpa.JpaObjectRetrievalFailureException - if id found by neo4j is invalid
      org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException - when activity is not found
      org.springframework.dao.InvalidDataAccessApiUsageException - when type is invalid
      java.io.IOException
      org.apache.lucene.queryparser.classic.ParseException
      ”date”
      2020/8/21
